body:
Hello there dudes and dudettes, I am the Ingigo and today I have a video for you to watch, a battle between me and my friend awesome_apricot, a great friend! This was recorded with Mirillis Action, Edited with Sony Vegas so yeah, please watch! The Thumbnail was made in Photoshop and Paint.NET and the 3D models were made in Cinema 4D! Well Watch to see who wins!

TheIngigo's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdH6leUWRYW5kZ0GX-8C9YQ
If you liked the video, please like, share and subscribe please!
TheIngigo's Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BRzoV5zu6U0
